Package p2p.index

Interface Summary
IDBDataTypeHandler Implement this interface, if the application above P-Grid is interested in having its own DATA schema/table.
Index Defines the operations that the storage layer supports.
IndexEntry Defines the operations that all data items stored on the network support.
Query Defines the operations that queries support.
Type Used to define types of data items to store.
TypeHandler Used to define types of data items to store.
 

Class Summary
IndexFactory Abstract Factory (GoF) that defines the operations that create various objects of the Index subsystem.
